raffles.announceInterval: Le lotterie aperte saranno annunciate ogni $value minuti
raffles.to-enter-raffle: Per inserire il tipo "$keyword". La lotteria è aperta per $eligibility.
raffles.to-enter-ticket-raffle: Per inserire il tipo "$keyword <$min-$max>". La lotteria è aperta per $eligibility.
raffles.join-messages-will-be-deleted: I tuoi messaggi lotteria verranno eliminati al momento dell'adesione.
raffles.cannot-create-raffle-without-keyword: Siamo spiacenti, $sender, ma non puoi creare la lotteria senza parola chiave
raffles.raffle-is-already-running: Spiacenti, $sender, la lotteria è già in esecuzione con la parola chiave $keyword
raffles.no-raffle-is-currently-running: $sender, nessuna lotteria senza vincitori è attualmente in corso
raffles.no-participants-to-pick-winner: $sender, nessuno si è unito a una lotteria
raffles.raffle-winner-is: Vincitore della lotteria $keyword è $username! La probabilità di vittoria è stata $probability%!

bets.running: $sender, la scommessa è già aperta! Opzioni scommessa: $options. Usa $command close 1-$maxIndex
bets.notRunning: Nessuna scommessa è attualmente aperta, chiedi alle mod per aprirla!
bets.opened: Nuova scommessa '$title' è aperta! Opzioni scommessa: $options. Usa $command 1-$maxIndex <amount> per vincere! Hai solo $minutesmin per scommettere!
bets.closeNotEnoughOptions: $sender, è necessario selezionare l'opzione vincente per la puntata vicina.
bets.notEnoughOptions: $sender, le nuove scommesse hanno bisogno di almeno 2 opzioni!
bets.info: Scommessa '$title' è ancora aperta! Scommessa opzioni: $options. Usa $command 1-$maxIndex <amount> per vincere! Hai solo $minutesmin per scommettere!
bets.diffBet: $sender, hai già fatto una scommessa su $option e non puoi scommettere su opzioni diverse!
bets.undefinedBet: Siamo spiacenti, $sender, ma questa opzione di puntata non esiste, usa $command per controllare l'utilizzo
bets.betPercentGain: Puntata percentuale di guadagno per opzione è stata impostata a $value%
bets.betCloseTimer: Le scommesse saranno automaticamente chiuse dopo $valuemin
bets.refund: Le scommesse sono state chiuse senza una vincita. Tutti gli utenti sono rimborsati!
bets.notOption: $sender, questa opzione non esiste! La scommessa non è chiusa, controlla $command
bets.closed: Le scommesse sono state chiuse e l'opzione di vincita è stata $option! $amount utenti hanno vinto in totale $points $pointsName!
bets.timeUpBet: Immagino che tu sia troppo tardi, $sender, il tuo tempo per scommettere è finito!
bets.locked: Il tempo delle scommesse è finito! Niente più scommesse.
bets.lockedInfo: Scommessa '$title' è ancora aperta, ma il tempo per scommettere è finito!
bets.removed: Il tempo delle scommesse è finito! Non sono state inviate scommesse -> si chiudono automaticamente
bets.error: Siamo spiacenti, $sender, questo comando non è corretto! Usa $command 1-$maxIndex <amount>. Ad esempio $command 0 100 scommetterà 100 punti all'oggetto 0.

alias.alias-was-not-found: $sender, alias $alias non è stato trovato nel database
alias.list-is-empty: $sender, la lista degli alias è vuota
alias.alias-group-set: $sender, l'alias $alias è stato impostato sul gruppo $group
alias.alias-group-unset: $sender, il gruppo di alias $alias è stato disattivato

customcmds.command-was-not-found: $sender, il comando $command non è stato trovato nel database
customcmds.response-was-not-found: $sender, la risposta #$response del comando $command non è stata trovata nel database
customcmds.command-was-edited: $sender, il comando $command è stato cambiato in '$response'
customcmds.response-was-removed: $sender, la risposta #$response di $command è stata rimossa
customcmds.list-of-responses-is-empty: $sender, $command non ha alcuna risposta o non esiste

keywords.keyword-is-ambiguous: $sender, la parola chiave $keyword è ambigua, usa l'ID della parola chiave
keywords.keyword-was-not-found: $sender, la parola chiave $keyword non è stata trovata nel database
keywords.response-was-not-found: $sender, risposta #$response della parola chiave $keyword non è stata trovata nel database
keywords.list-of-responses-is-empty: $sender, $keyword have no responses or doesn't exists

success.rain: Make it rain! All online users just received up to $amount $pointsName!

failed.undo: $sender, username wasn't found in database or user have no undo operations
failed.giveNotEnough: Sorry, $sender, you don't have $amount $pointsName to give it to $username

songs.song-was-banned: La canzone $name è stata bandita e non sarà mai più riprodotta!
songs.song-was-banned-timeout-message: Sei stato sospeso per aver pubblicato un brano bandito
songs.song-was-unbanned: Il brano è stato sbloccato con successo
songs.song-was-not-banned: Questa canzone non è stata bandita
songs.no-song-is-currently-playing: Nessun brano è attualmente in riproduzione
songs.song-is-banned: Sorry, $sender, but this song is banned
songs.youtube-is-not-responding-correctly: Sorry, $sender, but YouTube is sending unexpected responses, please try again later.
songs.song-was-not-found: Sorry, $sender, but this song was not found
songs.song-is-too-long: Sorry, $sender, but this song is too long
songs.incorrect-category: Sorry, $sender, but this song must be music category
songs.song-was-removed-from-queue: $sender, your song $name was removed from queue

price.user-have-not-enough-points: Sorry, $sender, but you don't have $amount $pointsName to use $command
price.user-have-not-enough-points-or-bits: Sorry, $sender, but you don't have $amount $pointsName or redeem command by $bitsAmount bits to use $command
price.user-have-not-enough-bits: Sorry, $sender, but you need to redeem command by $bitsAmount bits to use $command

ranks.rank-already-exist: $sender, there is already a rank for $type $hours$hlocale
ranks.user-dont-have-rank: $sender, you don't have a rank yet

successSameUsername.never: $sender, you are not follower of this channel
successSameUsername.time: $sender, you are following this channel for $diff

success.notNow: $sender, $username is currently not a channel subscriber. In total of $subCumulativeMonths $subCumulativeMonthsName.

success.time: $sender, $username is subscriber of channel. In total of $subCumulativeMonths $subCumulativeMonthsName.

successSameUsername.never: $sender, you are not a channel subscriber.

successSameUsername.timeWithSubStreak: $sender, you are subscriber of channel. Current sub streak for $diff ($subStreak $subStreakMonthsName) and in total of $subCumulativeMonths $subCumulativeMonthsName.
successSameUsername.time: $sender, you are subscriber of channel. In total of $subCumulativeMonths $subCumulativeMonthsName.

age.failed: $sender, I don't have data for $username account age

success.time: $username was last seen at $when in this channel

permissions.without-permission: You don't have enough permissions for '$command'

moderation.user-have-link-permit: User $username can post a $count $link to chat
moderation.user-is-warned-about-links: No links allowed, ask for !permit [$count warnings left]
moderation.user-is-warned-about-symbols: No excessive symbols usage [$count warnings left]
moderation.user-is-warned-about-long-message: Long messages are not allowed [$count warnings left]
moderation.user-is-warned-about-caps: No excessive caps usage [$count warnings left]
moderation.user-is-warned-about-spam: Spamming is not allowed [$count warnings left]
moderation.user-is-warned-about-color: Colors and /me is not allowed [$count warnings left]

queue.open: Queue is currently OPENED! Join to queue with !queue join

picked.single: This user was picked from queue: $users
picked.multi: These users were picked from queue: $users
picked.none: No users were found in queue

cooldowns.cooldown-was-enabled-for-moderators: $sender, cooldown for $command was enabled for moderators
cooldowns.cooldown-was-disabled-for-moderators: $sender, cooldown for $command was disabled for moderators
cooldowns.cooldown-was-enabled-for-owners: $sender, cooldown for $command was enabled for owners
cooldowns.cooldown-was-disabled-for-owners: $sender, cooldown for $command was disabled for owners
cooldowns.cooldown-was-enabled-for-subscribers: $sender, cooldown for $command was enabled for subscribers
cooldowns.cooldown-was-disabled-for-subscribers: $sender, cooldown for $command was disabled for subscribers
cooldowns.cooldown-was-enabled-for-followers: $sender, cooldown for $command was enabled for followers
cooldowns.cooldown-was-disabled-for-followers: $sender, cooldown for $command was disabled for followers

timers.id-or-name-must-be-defined: $sender, response id or timer name must be defined.
timers.cannot-set-messages-and-seconds-0: $sender, you cannot set both messages and seconds to 0.
timers.timer-was-set: $sender, timer $name was set with $messages messages and $seconds seconds to trigger
timers.timer-was-set-with-offline-flag: $sender, timer $name was set with $messages messages and $seconds seconds to trigger even when stream is offline
timers.timer-not-found: $sender, timer (name: $name) was not found in database. Check timers with !timers list
timers.timer-deleted: $sender, timer $name and its responses was deleted.
timers.response-not-found: $sender, response (id: $id) was not found in database

duel.joined: $sender, good luck with your dueling skills. You bet on yourself $points $pointsName!
duel.added: $sender really thinks he is better than others raising his bet to $points $pointsName!
duel.new: $sender is your new duel challenger! To participate use $command [points], you have $minutes $minutesName left to join.
duel.notEnoughOptions: $sender, you need to specify points to dueling
duel.noContestant: Only $winner have courage to join duel! Your bet of $points $pointsName are returned to you.
duel.winner: Congratulations to $winner! He is last man standing and he won $points $pointsName ($probability% with bet of $tickets $ticketsName)!

roulette.trigger: $sender is trying his luck and pulled a trigger
roulette.dead: $sender's brain was splashed on the wall!
roulette.mod: $sender is incompement and completely missed his head!

seppuku.mod: $sender tried to commit seppuku, but broke a sword.
seppuku.broadcaster: $sender tried to commit seppuku, but lost a sword.

fightme.challenge: (ง'̀-'́)ง $sender wants to fight you $username! If you accept, send $command $sender
fightme.winner: ٩(^ᴗ^)۶ $winner is proud winner and $loser is sore loser! Who's next?
fightme.notEnoughOptions: $sender, you need to select user to fight.
fightme.broadcaster: ψ(｀∇´)ψ $winner is a god among you. Beware $loser! This fight was decided even before it started.
fightme.bothModerators: $challenger (*-`ω´- )人(*-`ω´- ) $sender, this fight will take milleniums to decide!

gamble.minimalBet: $sender, minimal bet for !gamble is set to $value
gamble.notEnoughOptions: $sender, you need to specify points to gamble
gamble.winJackpot: $sender, you hit JACKPOT! You won $jackpot $jackpotName in addition to your bet. You now have $points $pointsName
gamble.loseWithJackpot: $sender, you LOST! You now have $points $pointsName. Jackpot increased to $jackpot $jackpotName

list.items: $sender, list of saved highlights for latest stream: $items

highlights.offline: $sender, cannot save highlight, stream is offline

disablePermissionWhispers.false: Bot will send permissions insufficient errors through whispers

disableCooldownWhispers.false: Bot will send cooldown notifications through whispers

phillipsHue.list: $sender, List of Phillips Hue connected lights:

subs: $sender, there is currently $onlineSubCount online subscribers. Last sub/resub was $lastSubUsername $lastSubAgo
followers: $sender, there is currently $onlineFollowersCount online followers. Last follow was $lastFollowUsername $lastFollowAgo

not.ignored: $sender, user $username is not ignored by bot

is.added: $sender, user $username is added to bot ignorelist
